1.1.name: wordpress/widget-profiles
1.1.description:
Well this was one of my smaller ideas in my Google Summer of Code application, which I.m guessing i didn.t get, but i figured i would release it regardless. So to the point.

Have you ever been playing around with your widgets and or new themes, but didn.t want to loose your current widget placement. Well with Widget Profiles you can save and manage a multitude of widget setups and arrangements. With a built in Undo feature you finally have full control of the design of your site.

  • Save Widget Profiles
  • Manage Unlimited Widget Profiles
  • Dummy Proof Undo Feature

Changelog

Aoril 13th, 2008: Fix nameing issues more April 12th, 2008: Money Hack to fix nameing issues April 10th, 2008: v1.1 - Fixing install bugs & cleaned code April 9th, 2008: v1.0 - First Release
